body_html:
Would anyone happen to know where someone not running a Debian derivative can get the source for libcupti?
Edit: nevermind... seems like its nvidia closed source... extracted the deb and copying libs by hand on my system felt quite dirty but did the trick (gentoo amd64)
body_text:

body:
Would anyone happen to know where someone not running a Debian derivative can get the source for libcupti?
Edit: nevermind... seems like its nvidia closed source... extracted the deb and copying libs by hand on my system felt quite dirty but did the trick (gentoo amd64)
